attributes.comment:
As a legal permanent resident, I don't think the agency have a valid reason to
adjust the immigration fees,specially when you see an open wide borders.Its
really insane and sickening what they're doing to this country. Its so unfair for
people who try to follow the laws, yet are being punish by non stop increase and
yet here's millions of illegals, just came across the borders, without fear, and
FREE OF CHARGE!

And what is the increase for? expedite the process? its a joke! it takes 10-15 yrs.
to process one application, if you are from other country.

People in the government are so educated yet lack of common sense. They are
giving away this country. I love America, and it breaks my heart to see what's
happening. People from others countries learn to speak the english language, and
yet, most hispanic people, who came here ILLEGALLY, don't need to learn
because the US government are adjusting for them and accomodate them with
open arms.

Anybody from the White House can save us from this insanity?

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
